survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Ride-Sharing Apps
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of ride-sharing apps to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?
questions.client_notes: Use a multiple-choice format with an 'Other' option to capture all possible responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single selection with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which ride-sharing app do you use most frequently?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using this ride-sharing app?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels accurately.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of using this ride-sharing app?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of ride-sharing app? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture various influencing factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox for multiple selections with an open-text option for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of ride-sharing app? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you experience issues with your ride-sharing app (e.g., delays, cancellations, app crashes)?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale to assess the prevalence of issues.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button for single selection.

script.question_text: How often do you experience issues with your ride-sharing app (e.g., delays, cancellations, app crashes)?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your ride-sharing app?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for improvements.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your ride-sharing app?
